member.name: NMDAYSTATE
member.summary: Carries information required to process the MCN_GETDAYSTATE notification code. All members of this structure are for input, exceptprgDayState, which the receiving application must set when processing MCN_GETDAYSTATE.

member.name: NMDAYSTATE.nmhdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about this notification code.

member.name: NMDAYSTATE.stStart
member.summary: structure that contains the starting date.

member.name: NMDAYSTATE.cDayState
member.summary: INT value specifying the total number of elements that must be in the array atprgDayState.

member.name: NMDAYSTATE.prgDayState
member.summary: Address of an array of MONTHDAYSTATE values. The buffer at this address must be large enough to contain at leastcDayState elements. The first element in the array corresponds to the date instStart.
